amendment.description: To modify the designation of facilities and resources constituting the Major Range and Test Facility Base.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2502 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2502 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12594) To modify the designation of facilities and resources constituting the Major Range and Test Facility Base.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2502 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2502 proposed by Senator Warner.
